QuestData.Title: On Our Own Terms
QuestData.Description: We're as ready as we'll ever be. No sense waiting around for the naga to find us.$b$bI'll address the men, then we'll meet the enemy on our own terms and let fate decide the outcome.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Captain Taylor in the Briny Cutter.
QuestData.RewardText: No time to address the troops now.$b$bJust as well. They know what must be done.
